variables.name: data|datadirectory
variables.label: Data.zip location - The location of the data.zip location (data|datadirectory)
variables.description: The location of the data.zip location

variables.name: image|app
variables.label: Application image - Name of the application image (image|app)
variables.description: Name of the application image

variables.name: image|appstructured
variables.label: Application structured image - Name of the application structured streaming image (image|appstructured)
variables.description: Name of the application structured streaming image

variables.name: image|loader
variables.label: Loader image - Name of the loader image (image|loader)
variables.description: Name of the loader image

variables.name: image|http
variables.label: HTTP client image - Name of the HTTP client image (image|http)
variables.description: Name of the HTTP client image

variables.name: image|grpc
variables.label: GRPC client image - Name of the GRPC client image (image|grpc)
variables.description: Name of the GRPC client image

variables.name: image|pullPolicy
variables.label: Image pull policy - Image pull policy (image|pullPolicy)
variables.description: Image pull policy

variables.name: image|version
variables.label: Image version - Image version should correspond to the FDP version (image|version)
variables.description: Image version should correspond to the FDP version

variables.name: app|jar
variables.label: JAR name - Name of the jar used for application (app|jar)
variables.description: Name of the jar used for application

variables.name: app|main
variables.label: main class - Fully qualified name of the main class used for application (app|main)
variables.description: Fully qualified name of the main class used for application

variables.name: structured|jar
variables.label: JAR name - Name of the jar used for structured application (structured|jar)
variables.description: Name of the jar used for structured application

variables.name: structured|main
variables.label: main class - Fully qualified name of the main class used for structured application (structured|main)
variables.description: Fully qualified name of the main class used for structured application

variables.name: components|app
variables.label: application - Pick an application to install (killrweather) or structured (components|app)
variables.description: Pick an application to install (killrweather) or structured

variables.name: components|http
variables.label: HTTP Client - Install HTTP client (yes/no) (components|http)
variables.description: Install HTTP client (yes/no)

variables.name: components|grpc
variables.label: GRPC Client - Install GRPC client (yes/no) (components|grpc)
variables.description: Install GRPC client (yes/no)

variables.name: configuration|kafka|brokerlist
variables.label: List of brokers to connect to - Coma separated list of brokers to connect to (configuration|kafka|brokerlist)
variables.description: Coma separated list of brokers to connect to

variables.name: configuration|cassandra|hosts
variables.label: List of Cassandra hosts to connect to - Coma separated list of Cassandra hosts to connect to (configuration|cassandra|hosts)
variables.description: Coma separated list of Cassandra hosts to connect to

variables.name: configuration|grafana|host
variables.label: Grafana host - Grafana host (configuration|grafana|host)
variables.description: Grafana host

variables.name: configuration|grafana|port
variables.label: Grafana port - Grafana port (configuration|grafana|port)
variables.description: Grafana port

variables.name: configuration|influx|host
variables.label: InfluxDB host - InfluxDB host (configuration|influx|host)
variables.description: InfluxDB host

variables.name: configuration|influx|port
variables.label: InfluxDB port - InfluxDB port (configuration|influx|port)
variables.description: InfluxDB port

variables.name: configuration|loader|publish_interval
variables.label: Data publish interval - Data publish interval, for example 1 sec (configuration|loader|publish_interval)
variables.description: Data publish interval, for example 1 sec

variables.name: configuration|loader|data_mount
variables.label: Data mount point for publisher data - Data mount point for publisher data (configuration|loader|data_mount)
variables.description: Data mount point for publisher data

variables.name: configuration|loader|batch_size
variables.label: Data publishing batch size - Data publishing batch size (configuration|loader|batch_size)
variables.description: Data publishing batch size
